attributes.action: Make it a legal requirement for a cat to be mircochipped like it is for dogs
attributes.additional_details: Mircochipping is an essential part of responsible pet ownership each yeah thousands of cats are are taken in as strays as they not been chipped. Mircochipping is a safe way to give a lost cat the best chance on finding there owner. It also ensures owners can be informed in a sad event of a passing. It will also help animal care homes reduce number of strays and help save them money in the long run
attributes.background: Change the law to also make it also a legal requirement to have cats chipped aswell from the age of 8 weeks plus

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334356
